expression-projection.text: NULL IN(SELECT (f1 between 0 and 1) FROM (SELECT f1 FROM t WHERE (@b:=NULL) - f2) as dt)
ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY order_id DESC)

function.text: ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY order_id DESC)

expression-projection.text: LISTAGG(c.category_name, '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY LENGTH (c."level") DESC)
PERCENT_RANK(15000, .05) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary, commission_pct)
PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department_id ORDER BY salary DESC)

function.text: PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department_id ORDER BY salary DESC)

expression-projection.text: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary DESC)
PERCENTILE_DISC(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary DESC) OVER (PARTITION BY department_id)
CUME_DIST(15500, .05) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary, commission_pct)
RANK(15500) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary DESC)
XMLELEMENT('Department', XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT('Employee', e.job_id||' '||e.last_name) ORDER BY last_name))
XMLCOLATTVAL(e.employee_id AS EVALNAME 'ID', e.last_name AS name, e.salary)
XMLEXISTS('//student[@age=20]' PASSING BY VALUE xcol AS x)
XMLFOREST(e.employee_id AS EVALNAME 'ID', e.last_name AS name, e.salary)
XMLQUERY('//student[@age=20]' PASSING BY VALUE xcol AS x RETURNING CONTENT NULL ON EMPTY)
XMLSERIALIZE(DOCUMENT c2 AS BLOB ENCODING 'UTF-8' VERSION 'a' IDENT SIZE = 0 SHOW DEFAULT)

xml-table-function.text: XMLTABLE('/Warehouse' PASSING warehouses.warehouse_spec COLUMNS "Water" varchar2(6) PATH 'WaterAccess',"Rail" varchar2(6) PATH 'RailAccess')

expression-projection.text: LAST_VALUE(AGE IGNORE NULLS) OVER (PARTITION BY AGE ORDER BY AGE)

function.text: LAST_VALUE(AGE IGNORE NULLS) OVER (PARTITION BY AGE ORDER BY AGE)
